item.description:
The Branford Festival celebrates its 25th Anniversary and offers something for everyone to enjoy. Whether you are interested in crafts, live music, car shows and of course food, the Branford Festival has got you covered. It is a wonderful way to relax and enjoy a summer evening with friends ( old and new).

The Festival Kicks off on Friday, June 19th with the cover band Big Shot performing the sounds of Billy Joel at 8:45. A performance that shouldn't be missed.

Since the festival is held on the Branford green it is necessary to bring either chairs or a blanket to sit back ,relax and enjoy the show. Plenty of food vendors will be present offering the typical festival fare, but don't let that discourage you from bringing your own favorite summer snacks.

For Directions and Parking check out http://www.branfordfe...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Purple/yellow ballons on the green near the stage or call 203-535-6192

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Summertime Fun: The Branford Festival - Friends, Food and Live Music
